title: Todo List
description: A private, signed todo list belonging to a single agent. Contains inline items (goals and tasks). The entire list is one signed document. When anything changes, the list is re-signed with a new jacsVersion.

jacsTodoName.description: Human-readable name for this todo list.

jacsTodoItems.description: Inline items (goals and tasks) in this list.

jacsTodoArchiveRefs.description: UUIDs of archived todo lists (previous versions or completed lists).
